desc:
Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
Slashes rapidly around you, damaging enemies over a large area.
Mana Cost: 40
Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 120%)
 (Thunder: 30%)
Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Increases your Walk Speed and Main Attack's damage by +5%.
Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack. </br> Mana Cost: -10

Spin Attack will activate twice, with a larger area of effect on the second spin.

Total Damage: -40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: -40%)
Area of Effect: +2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
For every 2% or 2 Raw Main Attack Damage you have from items, gain +5/3s Poison Damage. (Max 50/3s) </br> Your Main Attack gains additional range. </br> </br>Range: +1 Block
Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT </br> Dash in the direction you're facing. </br> Mana Cost: 20
Your Main Attack will hit twice, but deal -40% damage per hit.

Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Throws a bomb that slowly emanates smoke, damaging all enemies in it every 0.5s.
Mana Cost: 35
Total Damage: 35% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 25%)
 (Air: 5%)
 (Earth: 5%)
Range: 10 Blocks
Duration: 5s
Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the Mana cost of Dash. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Unleashes a rapid flurry of 8 hits to enemies facing you, dealing heavy damage.
Mana Cost: 40
Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per hit)
 (Damage: 30%)
 (Water: 10%)
Range: 3 Blocks (Cone-Shaped)
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%

Makes Multihit a single devastating hit. If you strike an enemy from behind, it deals double the damage.
Mana Cost: -5
Total Damage: 300% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 250%)
 (Earth: 50%)

Falling 5 blocks or more deals damage around you when you land.
This damage is increased by +12% for every additional block you fall afterwards, up to +10 blocks.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 90%)
 (Water: 15%)
 (Air: 15%)
Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Multihit's damage ramps up every hit, dealing additional damage. Damage bonus caps at 8 hits.

Total Damage: +6% (of your DPS, per hit)
 (Damage: +4%)
 (Air: +2%)
Dash will hide you into the shadows. You cannot heal or gain mana while in this state. (Attack or get hit to cancel) </br> </br>Effect: Invisibility to Self </br>Duration: 5s </br>Cooldown: 5s

Smoke Bomb will stick to enemies and deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +10% (of your DPS)
 (Fire: +10%)
When you hold shift while airborne, slowly glide and become immune to fall damage. (Max 10s)
Your first hit after casting Vanish will deal +80% more damage.

Summon 3 Mirror Clones after reappearing from Vanish that will follow and protect you. </br> When hit, lose a Mirror Clone, reducing -25% of incoming damage and granting you a damage bonus for 3s. (1s cooldown) </br> </br>Effect: 30% Damage Bonus to self </br>Cooldown: 15s

Spin Attack will lunge you forward, deal 3 strikes and then lunge you upward.
Using Hop while Lacerate is active launches you further.

Total Damage: 90% (of your DPS, per strike)
 (Damage: 60%)
 (Air: 20%)
 (Water: 10%)
Resets Vanish's cooldown after killing an enemy.

Smoke Bomb will throw +2 bombs.

Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: -10%)
Increase Smoke Bomb's range and area of effect. </br> </br>Range: +10 Blocks </br>Area of Effect: +1 Block (Circle-Shaped)
Gain +120% Speed Bonus when in Vanish.
Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit by 5.
Reduces Vanish's cooldown by -1.75s after striking an enemy from behind with Backstab.
When losing any Clone, it will cast one of your spells before dying. </br> Mirror Clones will cast Multihit before dying.
Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Spin Attack and Lacerate will deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS) (
Damage: +20%)
You gain +1 Mana if you hit an enemy while airborne. (1.25+ blocks off the ground to be airborne)
Smoke Bomb will pull nearby enemies. </br> </br>Range: 6 Blocks
Reduce the cooldown on all of your abilities by 30% every time you get hit for less than 10% of your max health. </br> </br>Cooldown: 1s
Leap forwards when you double jump. </br> </br>Cooldown: 2s
When using Swan Dive with 3+ Momentum, you will leap back into the air 0.25s after landing.
Dealing over 1.5x of your max health as damage in a single hit will deal 45% of the damage to other nearby enemies. </br> </br>Area of Effect: 10 Blocks (Circle-Shaped) </br>Cooldown: 2s
Summon +2 additional Mirror Clones with Mirror Image. </br> </br>Cooldown: +5s
Increase Multihit's amount of hits by +3. </br> Increase Finality's damage cap by +3 hits.
Smoke Bomb will add +1 Mark to enemies it hits. (Max 4, 0.1s Cooldown) </br> Marked enemies will take +7% damage from attacks for each mark they have. </br> Marked will decay once every 10s.

Last Laugh stores a number of Tricks on enemies based on the type of Clone. (Max 25)
Casting Dash while sneaking will detonate all nearby stored Tricks, dealing damage based on how many stacks were consumed.
Mirror Clones apply +1 Trick per hit. Mirage Clones apply +2 Tricks per hit. Shadow Clones apply +8 Tricks per hit.

Total Damage: 10% (of your DPS, per Trick)
 (Damage: 10%)
Range: 32 Blocks
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
After losing a Mirror Clone, your next Spin Attack or Smoke Bomb will be copied by all active Clones.

After using Dash, you prepare +3 shurikens. (Max 9)
Your next Main Attack will throw all your prepared shurikens.

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS, per shuriken)
 (Damage: 100%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Range: 50 Blocks
Increase the range of Multihit. </br> </br>Range: +2 Blocks
Increase your Walk Speed by +20% and your Jump Height by +1.
Increases Surprise Strike's damage by +40%.
Reduce the Mana cost of Dash. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Hitting an enemy with Swan Dive gives you a damage boost. </br> </br>Effect: +35% Damage Bonus to Self </br>Duration: 7.5s
Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack. </br> Mana Cost: -5
When exiting Vanish, pull all nearby Marked mobs towards where you entered Vanish. </br> </br>Range: 20 Blocks
Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit. </br> Mana Cost: -5
After killing an enemy, salvage 50% of their Tricks. (Max 10 per mob, 40 total) </br> Casting Spin Attack while sneaking will transfer salvaged Tricks onto enemies and immediately detonate them.
Reduces Hop's cooldown by -1s. Using Hop into a wall will bounce you backward. (Hold shift to cancel)

Increases Spin Attack and Lacerate's range and damage, and adds +1 Mark to enemies hit.

Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +20%)
Area of Effect: +1 Block (Circle-Shaped)

Lacerate deals more damage, and will slash +1 more time.

Total Damage: +10% (of your DPS)
 (Thunder: +10%)
Increases Violent Vortex's damage  by +55% and increases the damage requirement to be 2.5x your max health.
Gain +2 Mana for every leftover Mark when killing an enemy, and for every Mark you consume with your abilities.
Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Multihit gains extra damage and can be aimed in all directions.
Multihit Damage: +10% (of your DPS, per hit)
 (Thunder: +10%)
Increase your maximum Marks by +2.

Bamboozle coats enemies struck with a flammable catalyst, making them +1% Enkindled whenever you strike them.
The catalyst flares up when it reaches 100% or at the end of its duration, dealing damage based on how Enkindled the target was.
Enkindled enemies take +30% more
Fire damage from you.

Total Damage: 15% (of your DPS, per 1% Enkindle)
 (Damage: 12%)
 (Fire: 3%)
Duration: 8s
Cooldown: 8s
Your Shurikens will bounce 2 times between enemies upon impact. </br> </br>Range: 12 Blocks

If an enemy has 4+ Marks, your next Backstab will deal +200% damage, or your next Powder Special will deal +100% damage. </br> Both consume all Marks on the enemy. </br> </br>Cooldown: 15s (per enemy)

Smoke Bomb makes you and any allies become Noxious while standing in it, which lingers after leaving the area. </br> While Noxious, deal +10% damage to enemies for every debuff they have. (Max 5) Allies only receive 30% of the bonus. </br> </br>Duration: 3s

After spending 40 Mana or gaining 2 Momentum, an area underneath you blooms and damages enemies below it every 0.3s.
The duration is reset and the radius is increased after every bloom. (Max 5 Blooms)

Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS, from bloom)
 (Damage: 75%)
 (Earth: 15%)
 (Water: 15%)
 (Air: 15%)
Duration: 5s
Area of Effect: +1.5 Blocks (per bloom)
A maximum sized Jasmine Bloom will transform Swan Dive into a huge petal storm, consuming your bloom to give it increased damage and range </br> Explosion Damage: +200% </br>Area of Effect: +3 Blocks
Harvester will give +2 Mana.
Increases Marked's damage bonus by +4%.

Multihit will instead teleport you forward and strike with a brutal fiery slash.

Total Damage: 350% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 300%)
 (Fire: 50%)
Range: 6 Blocks
Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Cooldown: 5s

Detonating 15+ Tricks on enemies will temporarily reduce their damage. </br> Debuffs applied with Tricks will last +0.4s longer for each extra Trick detonated beyond the requirement. </br> </br>Effects: -15% Damage Bonus to Enemies </br>Duration: 10s

Detonating 25+ Tricks on enemies will make them Confused.
Confused enemies take +30% more
Thunder damage from you and will take damage whenever they attack.
You may store +15 more Tricks on enemies.

Total Damage: 160% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 130%)
 (Thunder: 30%)
Cooldown: 0.5s
Duration: 15s

When you double jump, throw a Shadow Clone in the direction you are facing.
Double jump again while sneaking to teleport to the clone, detonating it.
Shadow Clones will cast Spin Attack with Last Laugh.

Total Damage: 300% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 250%)
 (Fire: 50%)
Range: 32 Blocks
Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 8s
Cooldown: 8s

Detonating 20+ Tricks on enemies Contaminates them with toxic ooze.
Contaminated enemies take +30% more
Earth damage from you and will explode on death, damaging nearby enemies.
You may store +15 more Tricks on enemies.

Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 350%)
 (Earth: 50%)
Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 25s

If cast while in Vanish, Spin Attack will consume all Marks from nearby enemies to summon the Nightcloak Knife.
 The Knife will copy your attacks on enemies near you, dealing 9% of your damage for every 2 Mark consumed. (Max 10 Marks)
When entering and exiting Vanish, become immune to knockback and gain resistance for a brief moment. </br> </br>Effect: +60% Resistance Bonus to Self </br>Duration: 0.5s

Landing 15 hits against an enemy while midair grants you +1 Momentum. (Max 10)
Ripple consumes your Momentum, releasing a powerful explosion that deals massive damage and briefly blinds enemies. For each stack of Momentum, this explosion deals +10% more damage.
While midair, hold shift to quickly drop down.

Total Damage: 480% (of your DPS, over 5 hits)
 (Damage: 400%)
 (Earth: 40%)
 (Air: 40%)
Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effect: Blindness to Enemies
Duration: 1s

Detonating 30+ Tricks on enemies will make them 200% Drained and take +30% more </br>Water damage from you. </br> Whenever you or an ally attacks a Drained enemy, siphon 7.5% of it, converting it into 7.5% Overhealth that decays over 20s. (Max 25%) </br> You may store +20 more Tricks on enemies. </br> </br>Cooldown: 2s </br>Duration: 25s
While Mirror Image is active, Bamboozle will slay a Mirror Clone instead of having a cooldown. </br> Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit. </br> Mana Cost: -5

After using Bamboozle or Shadow Projection to teleport, leave behind a Mirage Clone which draws mobs within 8 blocks towards it. </br> Mirage Clones disappear when an enemy is within 0.75 blocks or when they expire, and will cast Smoke Bomb with Last Laugh. </br> </br>Duration: 5s </br>Cooldown: 2s
